law.catch_line: Plans for solid waste storage and collection for commercial and multi-family residential establishments to be approved before issuance of building permit.

text.section:
Sec. 15-4. Plans for solid waste storage and collection for commercial and multi-family residential establishments to be approved before issuance of building permit.
Before building permits may be issued for construction of commercial or multi-family residential establishments, in areas not served by municipal collection agencies, plans for storage and collection of solid waste must be approved by the Director as to location, accessibility, number or adequacy. No certificate of occupancy shall be issued for said premises until plans are approved by the Director for compliance with the terms of this section.
